attributes.action: Award a George Medal to Ukraine
attributes.additional_details: It would send a clear message of our support and appreciation of their courage to the world.
attributes.background: "On 15th April 1942 King George VI awarded the George Cross to the people of Malta in appreciation of their heroism". I believe that the country and people of Ukraine also deserve this award.

rejection.details:
The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
